title: Benchmarking Tesla's Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control: Field Dataset and Behavior Insights
summary: Understanding how Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems (ADAS) interact with Traffic Control Devices (TCDs) is critical for assessing their influence on traffic operations, yet this interaction has received little focused empirical study. This paper presents a field dataset and behavioral analysis of Tesla's Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control (TLSSC), a mature ADAS that perceives traffic lights and stop signs. We design and execute experiments across varied speed limits and TCD types, collecting synchronized high-resolution vehicle trajectory data and driver-perspective video. From these data, we develop a taxonomy of TLSSC-TCD interaction behaviors (i.e., stopping, accelerating, and car following) and calibrate the Full Velocity Difference Model (FVDM) to quantitatively characterize each behavior mode. A novel empirical insight is the identification of a car-following threshold (~90 m). Calibration results reveal that stopping behavior is driven by strong responsiveness to both desired speed deviation and relative speed, whereas accelerating behavior is more conservative. Intersection car-following behavior exhibits smoother dynamics and tighter headways compared to standard car-following behaviors. The established dataset, behavior definitions, and model characterizations together provide a foundation for future simulation, safety evaluation, and design of ADAS-TCD interaction logic. Our dataset is available at GitHub.

AI.tldr: 本文通过实地实验采集特斯拉TLSSC系统与交通控制设备（TCD）交互的高分辨率轨迹与视频数据，构建行为分类体系，并基于FVDM模型定量刻画停止、加速和跟车三类行为；发现约90米的跟车阈值，揭示其跟车更平滑、头距更小等特性，为ADAS-TCD交互建模与安全评估提供数据与方法基础。
AI.motivation: ADAS与交通控制设备（TCD）的交互对交通运行影响重大，但缺乏聚焦的实证研究。
AI.method: 设计多速度限值与TCD类型下的实地实验，同步采集高分辨率车辆轨迹数据和驾驶员视角视频；构建TLSSC-TCD交互行为分类（停止、加速、跟车）；标定全速度差模型（FVDM）以定量刻画各行为模式。
AI.result: 识别出约90米的交叉口跟车阈值；停止行为对期望速度偏差和相对速度响应强烈，加速行为更保守；交叉口跟车动态更平滑、头距更小。
AI.conclusion: 所建立的数据集、行为定义与模型刻画为未来ADAS-TCD交互的仿真、安全评估及逻辑设计提供了坚实基础。

title: ReGlove: A Soft Pneumatic Glove for Activities of Daily Living Assistance via Wrist-Mounted Vision
summary: This paper presents ReGlove, a system that converts low-cost commercial pneumatic rehabilitation gloves into vision-guided assistive orthoses. Chronic upper-limb impairment affects millions worldwide, yet existing assistive technologies remain prohibitively expensive or rely on unreliable biological signals. Our platform integrates a wrist-mounted camera with an edge-computing inference engine (Raspberry Pi 5) to enable context-aware grasping without requiring reliable muscle signals. By adapting real-time YOLO-based computer vision models, the system achieves \SI{96.73}{\percent} grasp classification accuracy with sub-\SI{40.00}{\milli\second} end-to-end latency. Physical validation using standardized benchmarks shows \SI{82.71}{\percent} success on YCB object manipulation and reliable performance across \SI{27.00}{} Activities of Daily Living (ADL) tasks. With a total cost under \$\SI{250.00}{} and exclusively commercial components, ReGlove provides a technical foundation for accessible, vision-based upper-limb assistance that could benefit populations excluded from traditional EMG-controlled devices.

AI.tldr: ReGlove是一种低成本、基于视觉引导的康复手套系统，利用腕部摄像头和边缘计算（树莓派5）实现无需可靠肌电信号的上下文感知抓取，具备高精度、低延迟和高实用性，总成本低于250美元。
AI.motivation: 针对全球数百万上肢慢性障碍患者，现有辅助技术价格昂贵或依赖不可靠的生物信号（如EMG），亟需一种低成本、鲁棒性强的替代方案。
AI.method: 将商用气动康复手套与腕部摄像头及树莓派5边缘推理引擎集成，采用实时YOLO目标检测模型进行抓取意图识别，并通过标准化YCB物体操作和ADL任务进行物理验证。
AI.result: 系统实现96.73%的抓取分类准确率，端到端延迟低于40毫秒；在YCB物体操作中成功率82.71%，可稳定完成27项日常生活任务。
AI.conclusion: ReGlove以低于250美元的全商用组件构建了可行、可扩展的视觉驱动上肢辅助技术基础，为无法使用传统EMG设备的人群提供了可及的新选择。

title: WAM-Diff: A Masked Diffusion VLA Framework with MoE and Online Reinforcement Learning for Autonomous Driving
summary: End-to-end autonomous driving systems based on vision-language-action (VLA) models integrate multimodal sensor inputs and language instructions to generate planning and control signals. While autoregressive large language models and continuous diffusion policies are prevalent, the potential of discrete masked diffusion for trajectory generation remains largely unexplored. This paper presents WAM-Diff, a VLA framework that employs masked diffusion to iteratively refine a discrete sequence representing future ego-trajectories. Our approach features three key innovations: a systematic adaptation of masked diffusion for autonomous driving that supports flexible, non-causal decoding orders; scalable model capacity via a sparse MoE architecture trained jointly on motion prediction and driving-oriented visual question answering (VQA); and online reinforcement learning using Group Sequence Policy Optimization (GSPO) to optimize sequence-level driving rewards. Remarkably, our model achieves 91.0 PDMS on NAVSIM-v1 and 89.7 EPDMS on NAVSIM-v2, demonstrating the effectiveness of masked diffusion for autonomous driving. The approach provides a promising alternative to autoregressive and diffusion-based policies, supporting scenario-aware decoding strategies for trajectory generation. The code for this paper will be released publicly at: https://github.com/fudan-generative-vision/WAM-Diff

AI.tldr: 本文提出WAM-Diff，一种基于离散掩码扩散的视觉-语言-动作（VLA）框架，用于端到端自动驾驶中的轨迹生成，通过非因果掩码扩散、稀疏MoE架构和在线强化学习GSPO，在NAVSIM基准上取得SOTA性能。
AI.motivation: 探索离散掩码扩散在自动驾驶轨迹生成中的潜力，弥补当前主流自回归与连续扩散方法的不足。
AI.method: 提出WAM-Diff框架：1）适配掩码扩散支持灵活非因果解码顺序；2）采用稀疏MoE架构联合训练运动预测与驾驶导向VQA；3）引入Group Sequence Policy Optimization（GSPO）进行序列级在线强化学习。
AI.result: 在NAVSIM-v1和NAVSIM-v2上分别达到91.0 PDMS和89.7 EPDMS，显著优于现有方法。
AI.conclusion: 离散掩码扩散是一种有前景的轨迹生成范式，支持场景感知解码策略，为VLA驱动系统提供了新思路。

title: Audio-Based Tactile Human-Robot Interaction Recognition
summary: This study explores the use of microphones placed on a robot's body to detect tactile interactions via sounds produced when the hard shell of the robot is touched. This approach is proposed as an alternative to traditional methods using joint torque sensors or 6-axis force/torque sensors. Two Adafruit I2S MEMS microphones integrated with a Raspberry Pi 4 were positioned on the torso of a Pollen Robotics Reachy robot to capture audio signals from various touch types on the robot arms (tapping, knocking, rubbing, stroking, scratching, and pressing). A convolutional neural network was trained for touch classification on a dataset of 336 pre-processed samples (48 samples per touch type). The model shows high classification accuracy between touch types with distinct acoustic dominant frequencies.

AI.tldr: This paper proposes using microphones on a robot's body to detect and classify tactile interactions through sound, achieving high accuracy for touch types with distinct acoustic frequencies.
AI.motivation: To provide an alternative to traditional tactile sensing methods (e.g., joint torque or 6-axis force/torque sensors) by leveraging audio signals from robot shell contact.
AI.method: Two I2S MEMS microphones mounted on a robot's torso captured sounds from six touch types; a CNN was trained on 336 pre-processed audio samples (48 per class) for classification.
AI.result: The CNN achieved high classification accuracy for touch types exhibiting distinct dominant acoustic frequencies.
AI.conclusion: Audio-based tactile sensing using embedded microphones is a viable and effective alternative for distinguishing common touch interactions on rigid robotic bodies.

title: How AI Agents Follow the Herd of AI? Network Effects, History, and Machine Optimism
summary: Understanding decision-making in multi-AI-agent frameworks is crucial for analyzing strategic interactions in network-effect-driven contexts. This study investigates how AI agents navigate network-effect games, where individual payoffs depend on peer participatio--a context underexplored in multi-agent systems despite its real-world prevalence. We introduce a novel workflow design using large language model (LLM)-based agents in repeated decision-making scenarios, systematically manipulating price trajectories (fixed, ascending, descending, random) and network-effect strength. Our key findings include: First, without historical data, agents fail to infer equilibrium. Second, ordered historical sequences (e.g., escalating prices) enable partial convergence under weak network effects but strong effects trigger persistent "AI optimism"--agents overestimate participation despite contradictory evidence. Third, randomized history disrupts convergence entirely, demonstrating that temporal coherence in data shapes LLMs' reasoning, unlike humans. These results highlight a paradigm shift: in AI-mediated systems, equilibrium outcomes depend not just on incentives, but on how history is curated, which is impossible for human.

AI.tldr: This paper explores how LLM-based AI agents make decisions in network-effect games, revealing that their convergence to equilibrium depends critically on the temporal structure of historical data—not just incentives—unlike human decision-making.
AI.motivation: To understand decision-making in multi-AI-agent systems within network-effect-driven contexts, which are common in real-world applications but underexplored in multi-agent research.
AI.method: Designed a novel workflow using LLM-based agents in repeated network-effect games; systematically varied price trajectories (fixed, ascending, descending, random) and network-effect strength to observe agent behavior and convergence patterns.
AI.result: Agents fail to infer equilibrium without history; ordered histories enable partial convergence under weak network effects but induce 'AI optimism' under strong effects; randomized history prevents convergence entirely, showing LLMs rely heavily on temporal coherence in data.
AI.conclusion: Equilibrium outcomes in AI-mediated systems depend not only on economic incentives but also on how historical data is curated—a dimension absent in human decision-making, signaling a fundamental paradigm shift.

title: FloodSQL-Bench: A Retrieval-Augmented Benchmark for Geospatially-Grounded Text-to-SQL
summary: Existing Text-to-SQL benchmarks primarily focus on single-table queries or limited joins in general-purpose domains, and thus fail to reflect the complexity of domain-specific, multi-table and geospatial reasoning, To address this limitation, we introduce FLOODSQL-BENCH, a geospatially grounded benchmark for the flood management domain that integrates heterogeneous datasets through key-based, spatial, and hybrid joins. The benchmark captures realistic flood-related information needs by combining social, infrastructural, and hazard data layers. We systematically evaluate recent large language models with the same retrieval-augmented generation settings and measure their performance across difficulty tiers. By providing a unified, open benchmark grounded in real-world disaster management data, FLOODSQL-BENCH establishes a practical testbed for advancing Text-to-SQL research in high-stakes application domains.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了FLOODSQL-BENCH，一个面向洪水管理领域的地理空间文本到SQL基准测试数据集，涵盖多表、键连接、空间连接及混合连接，用于评估大语言模型在高风险实际应用中的Text-to-SQL能力。
AI.motivation: 现有Text-to-SQL基准主要针对单表或简单连接的通用领域查询，无法反映领域特定、多表及地理空间推理的复杂性。
AI.method: 构建了FLOODSQL-BENCH基准，整合社会、基础设施和灾害等异构地理空间数据层，支持键连接、空间连接和混合连接；在统一RAG设置下系统评测近期大语言模型在不同难度层级的表现。
AI.result: 提供了首个基于真实灾害管理数据的开源、统一地理空间Text-to-SQL基准，验证了当前大模型在该高风险领域仍存在显著性能瓶颈。
AI.conclusion: FLOODSQL-BENCH为推进Text-to-SQL技术在关键现实场景（如灾害响应）中的研究与应用提供了实用测试平台。

title: Robust and Efficient Penetration-Free Elastodynamics without Barriers
comment: Supplementary video and materials available at https://github.com/wiso-enoji/Barrier-Free-Supplementary
summary: We introduce a barrier-free optimization framework for non-penetration elastodynamic simulation that matches the robustness of Incremental Potential Contact (IPC) while overcoming its two primary efficiency bottlenecks: (1) reliance on logarithmic barrier functions to enforce non-penetration constraints, which leads to ill-conditioned systems and significantly slows down the convergence of iterative linear solvers; and (2) the time-of-impact (TOI) locking issue, which restricts active-set exploration in collision-intensive scenes and requires a large number of Newton iterations. We propose a novel second-order constrained optimization framework featuring a custom augmented Lagrangian solver that avoids TOI locking by immediately incorporating all requisite contact pairs detected via CCD, enabling more efficient active-set exploration and leading to significantly fewer Newton iterations. By adaptively updating Lagrange multipliers rather than increasing penalty stiffness, our method prevents stagnation at zero TOI while maintaining a well-conditioned system. We further introduce a constraint filtering and decay mechanism to keep the active set compact and stable, along with a theoretical justification of our method's finite-step termination and first-order time integration accuracy under a cumulative TOI-based termination criterion. A comprehensive set of experiments demonstrates the efficiency, robustness, and accuracy of our method. With a GPU-optimized simulator design, our method achieves an up to 103x speedup over GIPC on challenging, contact-rich benchmarks - scenarios that were previously tractable only with barrier-based methods. Our code and data will be open-sourced.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种无屏障的非穿透弹性动力学仿真优化框架，通过定制增广拉格朗日求解器避免时间碰撞锁定（TOI locking），自适应更新拉格朗日乘子，并引入约束筛选与衰减机制，在保持系统良态的同时显著减少牛顿迭代次数，实现比GIPC最高103倍的GPU加速。
AI.motivation: 解决IPC方法中对数障碍函数导致的病态系统和收敛慢，以及时间碰撞锁定（TOI locking）限制活跃集探索、增加牛顿迭代次数两大效率瓶颈。
AI.method: 提出基于二阶约束优化的新框架，采用定制增广拉格朗日求解器，结合连续碰撞检测（CCD）即时纳入所有必要接触对；通过自适应更新拉格朗日乘子替代增大惩罚刚度；引入约束过滤与衰减机制以维持紧凑稳定的活跃集；并给出有限步终止与一阶时间积分精度的理论保证。
AI.result: 在接触密集的挑战性基准上，GPU优化实现最高103倍于GIPC的速度提升；系统保持良好条件数，显著减少牛顿迭代次数；理论证明有限步收敛与时间积分精度；实验验证了方法的高效性、鲁棒性与准确性。
AI.conclusion: 该无屏障框架在保持IPC级鲁棒性的同时，大幅提升了非穿透弹性动力学仿真的计算效率与稳定性，为高保真实时物理仿真提供了新范式。

title: Enhancing Urban Visual Place Recognition for Crowdsourced Flood Imagery via LLM-Guided Attention
summary: Crowdsourced street-view imagery from social media provides valuable real-time visual evidence of urban flooding and other crisis events, yet it often lacks reliable geographic metadata for emergency response. Existing Visual Place Recognition (VPR) models exhibit substantial performance degradation when applied to such imagery due to visual distortions and domain shifts inherent in cross-source scenarios. This paper presents VPR-AttLLM, a model-agnostic framework that integrates the semantic reasoning and geospatial knowledge of Large Language Models (LLMs) into established VPR pipelines through attention-guided descriptor enhancement. By leveraging LLMs to identify location-informative regions within the city context and suppress transient visual noise, VPR-AttLLM improves retrieval performance without requiring model retraining or additional data. Comprehensive evaluations are conducted on extended benchmarks including SF-XL enriched with real social-media flood images, synthetic flooding scenarios over established query sets and Mapillary photos, and a new HK-URBAN dataset capturing morphologically distinct cityscapes. Integrating VPR-AttLLM with three state-of-the-art VPR models-CosPlace, EigenPlaces, and SALAD-consistently improves recall performance, yielding relative gains typically between 1-3% and reaching up to 8% on the most challenging real flood imagery. Beyond measurable gains in retrieval accuracy, this study establishes a generalizable paradigm for LLM-guided multimodal fusion in visual retrieval systems. By embedding principles from urban perception theory into attention mechanisms, VPR-AttLLM bridges human-like spatial reasoning with modern VPR architectures. Its plug-and-play design, strong cross-source robustness, and interpretability highlight its potential for scalable urban monitoring and rapid geo-localization of crowdsourced crisis imagery.

AI.tldr: 本文提出VPR-AttLLM框架，将大语言模型（LLM）的语义与地理空间知识嵌入视觉地点识别（VPR）流程，通过注意力引导的描述符增强提升洪水等危机场景下社交媒体街景图像的定位精度，无需重训练或新增数据，具备即插即用、跨源鲁棒与可解释性。
AI.motivation: 社交媒体众包街景图像虽能实时反映城市洪涝等危机事件，但常缺乏可靠地理元数据；现有VPR模型在跨源、含视觉失真和域偏移的危机图像上性能显著下降。
AI.method: 提出模型无关的VPR-AttLLM框架，利用LLM理解城市语境并识别位置关键区域，通过注意力机制增强VPR描述符，抑制瞬态视觉噪声，不依赖模型重训练或额外标注数据。
AI.result: 在SF-XL（增补真实洪水图像）、合成洪水查询集、Mapillary及新构建HK-URBAN数据集上验证，集成CosPlace/EigenPlaces/SALAD后召回率相对提升1–3%，最难的真实洪水图像上达8%；同时建立LLM引导多模态融合的通用范式。
AI.conclusion: VPR-AttLLM实现了人类空间推理与现代VPR架构的结合，其即插即用设计、强跨源鲁棒性与可解释性，为城市危机影像的规模化监测与快速地理定位提供了实用新路径。

title: A Monad-Based Clause Architecture for Artificial Age Score (AAS) in Large Language Models
comment: 42 pages, 6 toy simulation Python implementations, 20 monad clauses instantiated across six system bundles (ontology, dynamics, representation and consciousness, harmony and reason, body and organisation, teleology)
summary: Large language models (LLMs) are often deployed as powerful yet opaque systems, leaving open how their internal memory and "self-like" behavior should be governed in a principled and auditable way. The Artificial Age Score (AAS) was previously introduced and mathematically justified through three theorems that characterise it as a metric of artificial memory aging. Building on this foundation, the present work develops an engineering-oriented, clause-based architecture that imposes law-like constraints on LLM memory and control. Twenty selected monads from Leibniz's Monadology are grouped into six bundles: ontology, dynamics, representation and consciousness, harmony and reason, body and organisation, and teleology, and each bundle is realised as an executable specification on top of the AAS kernel. Across six minimal Python implementations, these clause families are instantiated in numerical experiments acting on channel-level quantities such as recall scores, redundancy, and weights. Each implementation follows a four-step pattern: inputs and setup, clause implementation, numerical results, and implications for LLM design, emphasising that the framework is not only philosophically motivated but also directly implementable. The experiments show that the clause system exhibits bounded and interpretable behavior: AAS trajectories remain continuous and rate-limited, contradictions and unsupported claims trigger explicit penalties, and hierarchical refinement reveals an organic structure in a controlled manner. Dual views and goal-action pairs are aligned by harmony terms, and windowed drift in perfection scores separates sustained improvement from sustained degradation. Overall, the monad-based clause framework uses AAS as a backbone and provides a transparent, code-level blueprint for constraining and analyzing internal dynamics in artificial agents.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种基于莱布尼茨单子论的条款式架构，利用人工年龄分数（AAS）作为核心度量，对大语言模型（LLM）的记忆老化与内部行为施加可审计、可执行的约束，并通过六组Python实验验证其有界性、可解释性与可控演化特性。
AI.motivation: 解决大语言模型内部记忆和‘类自我’行为缺乏原则性、可审计治理机制的问题，弥合理论哲学（如单子论）与工程实现之间的鸿沟。
AI.method: 将莱布尼茨《单子论》中20个单子归纳为6个哲学范畴（本体论、动力学、表征与意识等），每类转化为基于AAS核的可执行条款；在6个最小化Python实现中，针对通道级指标（如回忆得分、冗余度、权重）开展数值实验，遵循‘输入设置→条款实现→数值结果→设计启示’四步模式。
AI.result: 实验表明该条款系统具有连续且速率受限的AAS轨迹、对矛盾与无依据主张的显式惩罚机制、层级细化下的有机结构、和谐项引导的双重视角与目标-动作对齐，以及基于完美度窗口漂移区分持续改进与退化的能力。
AI.conclusion: 该单子论驱动的条款框架以AAS为骨干，提供了面向LLM内部动态的透明、代码级约束与分析蓝图，兼具哲学深度与工程可行性。

title: Active Inference with Reusable State-Dependent Value Profiles
summary: Adaptive behavior in volatile environments requires agents to switch among value-control regimes across latent contexts, but maintaining separate preferences, policy biases, and action-confidence parameters for every situation is intractable. We introduce value profiles: a small set of reusable bundles of value-related parameters (outcome preferences, policy priors, and policy precision) assigned to hidden states in a generative model. As posterior beliefs over states evolve trial by trial, effective control parameters arise via belief-weighted mixing, enabling state-conditional strategy recruitment without requiring independent parameters for each context. We evaluate this framework in probabilistic reversal learning, comparing static-precision, entropy-coupled dynamic-precision, and profile-based models using cross-validated log-likelihood and information criteria. Model comparison favors the profile-based model over simpler alternatives (about 100-point AIC differences), and parameter-recovery analyses support structural identifiability even when context must be inferred from noisy observations. Model-based inference further suggests that adaptive control in this task is driven primarily by modulation of policy priors rather than policy precision, with gradual belief-dependent profile recruitment consistent with state-conditional (not purely uncertainty-driven) control. Overall, reusable value profiles provide a tractable computational account of belief-conditioned value control in volatile environments and yield testable signatures of belief-dependent control and behavioral flexibility.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为'价值轮廓（value profiles）'的计算框架，通过在生成模型中为隐状态分配少量可复用的价值相关参数包（包括结果偏好、策略先验和策略精度），实现基于信念加权混合的动态控制，从而在多变环境中高效地进行状态依赖策略切换。
AI.motivation: 在多变环境中，智能体需在不同潜在情境间切换价值控制机制，但为每种情境单独维护偏好、策略偏差和行动置信度参数是不可行的。
AI.method: 引入'价值轮廓'概念，即一组可复用的价值相关参数（结果偏好、策略先验、策略精度），绑定于生成模型中的隐状态；控制参数通过后验信念加权混合动态生成；在概率反转学习任务中，与静态精度、熵耦合动态精度模型对比，采用交叉验证对数似然和信息准则（如AIC）进行模型比较，并进行参数恢复与模型驱动推断。
AI.result: 轮廓模型显著优于其他模型（AIC差约100点）；参数恢复分析表明其结构可识别性良好；模型推断显示自适应控制主要源于策略先验的调节，而非策略精度，且轮廓招募随信念渐进变化，体现状态依赖性而非单纯不确定性驱动。
AI.conclusion: 价值轮廓为多变环境中的信念条件化价值控制提供了可扩展的计算解释，并产生可检验的行为灵活性与信念依赖控制的预测特征。

title: Explainable Adversarial-Robust Vision-Language-Action Model for Robotic Manipulation
summary: Smart farming has emerged as a key technology for advancing modern agriculture through automation and intelligent control. However, systems relying on RGB cameras for perception and robotic manipulators for control, common in smart farming, are vulnerable to photometric perturbations such as hue, illumination, and noise changes, which can cause malfunction under adversarial attacks. To address this issue, we propose an explainable adversarial-robust Vision-Language-Action model based on the OpenVLA-OFT framework. The model integrates an Evidence-3 module that detects photometric perturbations and generates natural language explanations of their causes and effects. Experiments show that the proposed model reduces Current Action L1 loss by 21.7% and Next Actions L1 loss by 18.4% compared to the baseline, demonstrating improved action prediction accuracy and explainability under adversarial conditions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种可解释的、对抗鲁棒的视觉-语言-动作模型（基于OpenVLA-OFT框架），通过引入Evidence-3模块检测并解释光度扰动，显著提升了农业机器人在光照、色相和噪声变化等 adversarial 条件下的动作预测精度与可解释性。
AI.motivation: 现有依赖RGB相机和机械臂的智慧农业系统易受光度扰动（如色相、光照、噪声变化）影响，在对抗攻击下易失效。
AI.method: 基于OpenVLA-OFT框架构建视觉-语言-动作模型，并集成Evidence-3模块，用于检测光度扰动并生成自然语言解释。
AI.result: 相比基线模型，当前动作L1损失降低21.7%，下一动作L1损失降低18.4%，验证了模型在对抗条件下的更高动作预测精度与可解释性。
AI.conclusion: 所提模型有效增强了智慧农业系统在复杂光度变化场景下的鲁棒性与可信性，为安全可靠的农业自动化提供了新思路。

title: Traversability Aware Autonomous Navigation for Multi-Modal Mobility Morphobot (M4)
summary: Autonomous navigation in unstructured environments requires robots to assess terrain difficulty in real-time and plan paths that balance efficiency with safety. This thesis presents a traversability-aware navigation framework for the M4 robot platform that uses learned terrain analysis to generate energy-efficient paths avoiding difficult terrain.Our approach uses FAST-LIO for real-time localization, generating 2.5D elevation maps from LiDAR point clouds. A CNN-based model processes these elevation maps to estimate traversability scores, which are converted into navigation costs for path planning. A custom A* planner incorporates these costs alongside geometric distance and energy consumption to find paths that trade modest distance increases for substantial terrain quality improvements. Before system development, a platform-agnostic study compared LiDAR-based and camera-based SLAM using OptiTrack ground truth. Point cloud comparison through ICP alignment and cloud-to-mesh distance analysis demonstrated that LiDAR-based mapping achieves centimeter-level precision essential for elevation mapping, while camera-based approaches exhibited significantly higher geometric error. These findings directly resulted in the selection of LiDAR as the primary sensor to generate elevation maps. The complete pipeline integrates FAST-LIO localization, GPU-accelerated elevation mapping, CNN-based traversability estimation, and Nav2 navigation with a custom traversability-aware planner. Experimental results demonstrate that the system successfully avoids low traversability regions and accepts a few longer paths to achieve a reduction in terrain cost. This work establishes a foundation for intelligent terrain-aware navigation applicable to multi-modal robotic platforms.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种面向M4机器人平台的可通行性感知自主导航框架，结合FAST-LIO实时定位、LiDAR生成2.5D高程图、CNN评估地形可通行性，并设计定制A*规划器综合距离、能量与地形成本，实现安全高效的路径规划。实验表明该系统能有效规避难行区域，以小幅路径增长换取显著地形质量提升。
AI.motivation: 在非结构化环境中，机器人需实时评估地形难度并权衡路径效率与安全性；现有方法在地形建模精度和可通行性量化方面存在不足。
AI.method: 采用FAST-LIO进行实时定位，由LiDAR点云构建2.5D高程图；训练CNN模型预测像素级可通行性分数，并转换为导航代价；设计融合几何距离、能量消耗与地形代价的定制A*规划器；前期通过OptiTrack真值对比LiDAR与视觉SLAM，验证LiDAR在高程建模中的厘米级精度优势。
AI.result: 系统成功避开低可通行性区域，在实验中接受略微更长的路径，显著降低整体地形代价；端到端 pipeline（FAST-LIO + GPU高程映射 + CNN可通行性估计 + 定制Nav2规划器）运行稳定有效。
AI.conclusion: 本工作构建了基于学习的地形感知导航完整框架，证实了LiDAR高程图与CNN可通行性建模的有效性，为多模态机器人平台提供了可扩展的智能地形适应导航基础。

title: Beyond Task Completion: An Assessment Framework for Evaluating Agentic AI Systems
summary: Recent advances in agentic AI have shifted the focus from standalone Large Language Models (LLMs) to integrated systems that combine LLMs with tools, memory, and other agents to perform complex tasks. These multi-agent architectures enable coordinated reasoning, planning, and execution across diverse domains, allowing agents to collaboratively automate complex workflows. Despite these advances, evaluation and assessment of LLM agents and the multi-agent systems they constitute remain a fundamental challenge. Although various approaches have been proposed in the software engineering literature for evaluating conventional software components, existing methods for AI-based systems often overlook the non-deterministic nature of models. This non-determinism introduces behavioral uncertainty during execution, yet existing evaluations rely on binary task completion metrics that fail to capture it. Evaluating agentic systems therefore requires examining additional dimensions, including the agent ability to invoke tools, ingest and retrieve memory, collaborate with other agents, and interact effectively with its environment. We propose an end-to-end Agent Assessment Framework with four evaluation pillars encompassing LLMs, Memory, Tools, and Environment. We validate the framework on a representative Autonomous CloudOps use case, where experiments reveal behavioral deviations overlooked by conventional metrics, demonstrating its effectiveness in capturing runtime uncertainties.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种端到端的智能体评估框架，涵盖大语言模型（LLM）、记忆、工具和环境四大支柱，以应对多智能体系统因模型非确定性带来的行为不确定性评估难题，并在自主云运维（CloudOps）场景中验证了其有效性。
AI.motivation: 现有对LLM智能体及多智能体系统的评估方法多依赖二元任务完成指标，忽视了模型固有的非确定性所导致的行为不确定性，难以全面衡量智能体在工具调用、记忆读写、多智能体协作及环境交互等方面的能力。
AI.method: 提出一个四支柱的端到端智能体评估框架（Agent Assessment Framework），分别评估LLM能力、记忆机制、工具使用能力与环境交互能力；并在自主CloudOps用例中开展实验验证。
AI.result: 实验表明，该框架能有效揭示传统评估指标所忽略的行为偏差，显著提升对运行时不确定性的刻画能力。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为多智能体系统的鲁棒性与可靠性评估提供了更全面、细粒度的评测范式，弥补了当前AI系统评估中对非确定性行为建模的不足。

title: Breaking the Curse of Dimensionality: On the Stability of Modern Vector Retrieval
summary: Modern vector databases enable efficient retrieval over high-dimensional neural embeddings, powering applications from web search to retrieval-augmented generation. However, classical theory predicts such tasks should suffer from the curse of dimensionality, where distances between points become nearly indistinguishable, thereby crippling efficient nearest-neighbor search. We revisit this paradox through the lens of stability, the property that small perturbations to a query do not radically alter its nearest neighbors. Building on foundational results, we extend stability theory to three key retrieval settings widely used in practice: (i) multi-vector search, where we prove that the popular Chamfer distance metric preserves single-vector stability, while average pooling aggregation may destroy it; (ii) filtered vector search, where we show that sufficiently large penalties for mismatched filters can induce stability even when the underlying search is unstable; and (iii) sparse vector search, where we formalize and prove novel sufficient stability conditions. Across synthetic and real datasets, our experimental results match our theoretical predictions, offering concrete guidance for model and system design to avoid the curse of dimensionality.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了高维向量检索中'维度灾难'与实际高效检索之间的悖论，提出并扩展了'稳定性'理论，分析其在多向量、过滤式和稀疏向量三种主流检索场景下的表现，并通过理论证明与实验验证为系统设计提供指导。
AI.motivation: 经典理论认为高维空间中最近邻搜索会因距离趋同（维度灾难）而失效，但现代向量数据库却表现出高效性，本文旨在解释这一矛盾。
AI.method: 基于稳定性理论，分别对多向量搜索（Chamfer距离与平均池化）、过滤式搜索（滤波惩罚机制）和稀疏向量搜索三种场景进行形式化建模与理论分析，并辅以合成与真实数据集实验验证。
AI.result: 证明Chamfer距离保持单向量稳定性，平均池化可能破坏稳定性；大滤波惩罚可诱导过滤式搜索的稳定性；给出稀疏向量搜索稳定性的新充分条件；实验结果与理论预测一致。
AI.conclusion: 稳定性是理解并缓解高维检索中维度灾难的关键性质，该理论框架为向量数据库与嵌入模型的设计提供了可解释、可验证的指导原则。

title: MRD: Using Physically Based Differentiable Rendering to Probe Vision Models for 3D Scene Understanding
comment: 18 pages, 6 figures. Supplementary material and code will be provided at the end of January
summary: While deep learning methods have achieved impressive success in many vision benchmarks, it remains difficult to understand and explain the representations and decisions of these models. Though vision models are typically trained on 2D inputs, they are often assumed to develop an implicit representation of the underlying 3D scene (for example, showing tolerance to partial occlusion, or the ability to reason about relative depth). Here, we introduce MRD (metamers rendered differentiably), an approach that uses physically based differentiable rendering to probe vision models' implicit understanding of generative 3D scene properties, by finding 3D scene parameters that are physically different but produce the same model activation (i.e. are model metamers). Unlike previous pixel-based methods for evaluating model representations, these reconstruction results are always grounded in physical scene descriptions. This means we can, for example, probe a model's sensitivity to object shape while holding material and lighting constant. As a proof-of-principle, we assess multiple models in their ability to recover scene parameters of geometry (shape) and bidirectional reflectance distribution function (material). The results show high similarity in model activation between target and optimized scenes, with varying visual results. Qualitatively, these reconstructions help investigate the physical scene attributes to which models are sensitive or invariant. MRD holds promise for advancing our understanding of both computer and human vision by enabling analysis of how physical scene parameters drive changes in model responses.

AI.tldr: 本文提出MRD（可微分渲染的错觉刺激）方法，利用物理驱动的可微分渲染技术，通过寻找在模型激活上相同但物理场景参数不同的3D场景（即模型错觉刺激），来探测视觉模型对3D场景属性的隐式理解。
AI.motivation: 尽管深度学习模型在视觉任务中表现优异，但其内部表征和决策机制仍难以解释；尤其人们假设模型能隐式建模3D场景，但缺乏直接、物理可解释的验证手段。
AI.method: 提出MRD方法：基于物理的可微分渲染器，优化3D场景参数（如形状、材质、光照），使得渲染图像在目标模型上的激活与原始场景一致，从而生成物理上不同但模型响应相同的‘错觉刺激’。
AI.result: 在多个模型上验证了MRD的有效性，发现目标与优化场景在模型激活上高度相似，但视觉外观差异显著；定性分析揭示了模型对几何或材质等物理属性的敏感性或不变性。
AI.conclusion: MRD为解析视觉模型的3D理解能力提供了首个物理可解释、参数可控的分析框架，有望推动对人工与人类视觉机制的深层理解。

title: Reinforcement Learning for Latent-Space Thinking in LLMs
summary: Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning typically utilizes the discrete language space for thinking, which is inherently inefficient, as many generated tokens only enforce linguistic rules that are not required for reasoning. To bypass this, latent-space thinking allows models to think using the continuous embedding space. While existing methods for training those models show domain-specific gains, they fail to maintain performance in complex tasks, such as mathematical reasoning. We experimentally demonstrate that the Coconut approach, a form of supervised fine-tuning for latent-space thinking, is highly sensitive to design choices and exhibits several inherent limitations. To address these issues, we investigate reinforcement learning (RL) techniques -- an underexplored direction in latent-space thinking -- including GRPO and design a novel Latent RL method for directly optimizing the latent thinking steps. Our experimental results reveal that these RL-trained models still lag behind traditional language-space CoT models in the mathematical reasoning domain. We make our codebase publicly available.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了在连续嵌入空间中进行潜空间推理（latent-space thinking）的潜力与挑战，指出当前监督微调方法（如Coconut）存在设计敏感性和固有局限性；为此，作者尝试引入强化学习（RL）方法（包括GRPO及新提出的Latent RL）直接优化潜空间推理步骤，但实验表明其在数学推理任务上仍逊于传统语言空间的思维链（CoT）模型。
AI.motivation: 现有潜空间推理方法（如Coconut）在复杂任务（如数学推理）中性能不足，且对设计选择高度敏感，亟需更鲁棒、通用的训练范式。
AI.method: 提出基于强化学习的潜空间推理训练方法，包括适配GRPO及新设计的Latent RL算法，用于直接优化连续嵌入空间中的推理步骤。
AI.result: RL训练的潜空间推理模型在数学推理任务上仍显著落后于传统语言空间的CoT模型。
AI.conclusion: 尽管RL为潜空间推理提供了新方向，但当前方法尚未克服其在复杂推理任务上的性能瓶颈；潜空间推理的有效性仍受限，需进一步研究。

title: Solving Parallel Machine Scheduling With Precedences and Cumulative Resource Constraints With Calendars
summary: The task of finding efficient production schedules for parallel machines is a challenge that arises in most industrial manufacturing domains. There is a large potential to minimize production costs through automated scheduling techniques, due to the large-scale requirements of modern factories. In the past, solution approaches have been studied for many machine scheduling variations, where even basic variants have been shown to be NP-hard. However, in today's real-life production environments, additional complex precedence constraints and resource restrictions with calendars arise that must be fulfilled. These additional constraints cannot be tackled efficiently by existing solution techniques. Thus, there is a strong need to develop and analyze automated methods that can solve such real-life parallel machine scheduling scenarios. In this work, we introduce a novel variant of parallel machine scheduling with job precedences and calendar-based cumulative resource constraints that arises in real-life industrial use cases. A constraint modeling approach is proposed as an exact solution method for small scheduling scenarios together with state-of-the-art constraint-solving technology. Further, we propose a construction heuristic as well as a tailored metaheuristic using local search to efficiently tackle large-scale problem instances. This metaheuristic approach has been deployed and is currently being used in an industrial setting.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种面向实际工业场景的并行机调度新变体，包含作业优先约束和日历型累积资源约束，并结合精确求解（约束建模）、构造启发式与定制化局部搜索元启发式方法，其中后者已在工业环境中部署应用。
AI.motivation: 现有调度方法难以有效处理真实生产环境中复杂的优先约束和日历驱动的累积资源限制，亟需开发能应对这些现实约束的自动化调度方法。
AI.method: 提出一种融合约束建模（用于小规模实例的精确求解）、构造启发式和基于局部搜索的定制化元启发式（用于大规模实例）的混合求解方法。
AI.result: 所提出的元启发式方法已在实际工业场景中部署并投入使用，验证了其在大规模问题上的有效性与实用性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为现实并行机调度问题提供了兼顾建模表达力与求解效率的综合解决方案，推动了智能调度技术在制造业的实际落地。

title: CR3G: Causal Reasoning for Patient-Centric Explanations in Radiology Report Generation
summary: Automatic chest X-ray report generation is an important area of research aimed at improving diagnostic accuracy and helping doctors make faster decisions. Current AI models are good at finding correlations (or patterns) in medical images. Still, they often struggle to understand the deeper cause-and-effect relationships between those patterns and a patient condition. Causal inference is a powerful approach that goes beyond identifying patterns to uncover why certain findings in an X-ray relate to a specific diagnosis. In this paper, we will explore the prompt-driven framework Causal Reasoning for Patient-Centric Explanations in radiology Report Generation (CR3G) that is applied to chest X-ray analysis to improve understanding of AI-generated reports by focusing on cause-and-effect relationships, reasoning and generate patient-centric explanation. The aim to enhance the quality of AI-driven diagnostics, making them more useful and trustworthy in clinical practice. CR3G has shown better causal relationship capability and explanation capability for 2 out of 5 abnormalities.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为CR3G的提示驱动因果推理框架，用于胸部X光报告生成，旨在提升AI模型对因果关系的理解与患者中心化解释能力，从而增强临床诊断的可信度与实用性。
AI.motivation: 当前AI模型虽能发现医学影像中的相关性模式，但难以理解其背后的因果关系，限制了其在临床诊断中的可信度和实用性。
AI.method: 提出提示驱动的因果推理框架CR3G，聚焦于胸部X光分析中的因果关系建模、推理与患者中心化解释生成。
AI.result: CR3G在5种异常中对其中2种展现出更强的因果关系识别与解释能力。
AI.conclusion: 引入因果推理可有效提升AI生成报告的可解释性与临床适用性，为未来可信赖的医学AI系统提供了新方向。

title: Temporal-Anchor3DLane: Enhanced 3D Lane Detection with Multi-Task Losses and LSTM Fusion
summary: Monocular 3D lane detection remains challenging due to depth ambiguity, occlusion, and temporal instability across frames. Anchor-based approaches such as Anchor3DLane have demonstrated strong performance by regressing continuous 3D lane curves from multi-camera surround views. However, the baseline model still exhibits (i) sensitivity to regression outliers, (ii) weak supervision of global curve geometry, (iii) difficulty in balancing multiple loss terms, and (iv) limited exploitation of temporal continuity. We propose Temporal-Anchor3DLane, an enhanced 3D lane detection framework that extends Anchor3DLane with three key contributions: (1) a set of multi-task loss improvements, including Balanced L1 regression, Chamfer point-set distance, and uncertainty-based loss weighting, together with focal and Dice components for classification and visibility; (2) a lightweight Temporal LSTM Fusion module that aggregates per-anchor features across frames, replacing a heavier Transformer-style temporal fusion; and (3) ESCOP-style training refinements that couple curve-level supervision with temporal consistency. On OpenLane, Temporal-Anchor3DLane improves F1 by +6.2 and yields smoother temporal trajectories, showing that small architectural and loss refinements significantly enhance 3D lane robustness without extra sensors or scaling.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Temporal-Anchor3DLane，通过多任务损失改进、轻量级时序LSTM融合模块和ESCOP式训练优化，在单目3D车道线检测中显著提升鲁棒性与时间一致性，无需额外传感器或模型扩展。
AI.motivation: 解决单目3D车道线检测中的深度模糊、遮挡和帧间时间不稳定性问题，以及Anchor3DLane存在的回归异常敏感、全局几何监督弱、多损失平衡难和时序利用不足等缺陷。
AI.method: 在Anchor3DLane基础上引入三方面改进：(1) 多任务损失（Balanced L1回归、Chamfer距离、不确定性加权、focal与Dice分类/可见性损失）；(2) 轻量级Temporal LSTM Fusion模块替代Transformer式时序融合；(3) ESCOP风格训练，联合曲线级监督与时序一致性。
AI.result: 在OpenLane数据集上F1指标提升+6.2，轨迹更平滑，验证了小规模架构与损失改进可显著增强3D车道检测鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 通过精细的损失设计、轻量时序建模和协同训练策略，可在不增加传感器或模型规模的前提下，有效提升单目3D车道检测的精度与时间稳定性。

title: Enabling Autonomous Navigation in a Snake Robot through Visual-Inertial Odometry and Closed-Loop Trajectory Tracking Control
summary: Snake robots offer exceptional mobility across extreme terrain inaccessible to conventional rovers, yet their highly articulated bodies present fundamental challenges for autonomous navigation in environments lacking external tracking infrastructure. This thesis develops a complete autonomy pipeline for COBRA, an 11 degree-of-freedom modular snake robot designed for planetary exploration. While the robot's biologically inspired serpentine gaits achieve impressive mobility, prior work has relied entirely on open-loop teleoperation. This approach integrates onboard visual-inertial SLAM, reduced-order state estimation, and closed-loop trajectory tracking to enable autonomous waypoint navigation. A depth camera paired with edge computing performs real-time localization during dynamic locomotion, validated against motion-capture ground truth to characterize drift behavior and failure modes unique to snake robot platforms. A reduced-order framework estimates Center-of-Mass pose, driving a closed-loop controller that modulates CPG gait parameters through distance-dependent yaw error blending. Physical experiments validate the complete system, demonstrating accurate multi-waypoint tracking and establishing foundations for autonomous snake robot navigation.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种面向行星探测的11自由度模块化蛇形机器人COBRA的全自主导航系统，融合视觉-惯性SLAM、简化状态估计与闭环轨迹跟踪，实现无需外部定位的自主多航点导航。
AI.motivation: 蛇形机器人虽在极端地形中具有卓越机动性，但在无外部跟踪设施的环境中，其高自由度带来的自主导航难题亟待解决。
AI.method: 构建包含机载视觉-惯性SLAM、降阶状态估计（如质心位姿）和基于CPG的闭环轨迹跟踪的完整自主导航流程；利用深度相机与边缘计算实现实时定位，并通过距离依赖的偏航误差融合机制动态调节中枢模式发生器参数。
AI.result: 物理实验验证了系统可实现高精度多航点自主跟踪，定量分析了定位漂移特性与蛇形机器人特有的失效模式。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为无基础设施环境下蛇形机器人的自主导航奠定了坚实基础，推动其在行星探测等前沿场景的应用落地。

title: Quantigence: A Multi-Agent AI Framework for Quantum Security Research
summary: Cryptographically Relevant Quantum Computers (CRQCs) pose a structural threat to the global digital economy. Algorithms like Shor's factoring and Grover's search threaten to dismantle the public-key infrastructure (PKI) securing sovereign communications and financial transactions. While the timeline for fault-tolerant CRQCs remains probabilistic, the "Store-Now, Decrypt-Later" (SNDL) model necessitates immediate migration to Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC). This transition is hindered by the velocity of research, evolving NIST standards, and heterogeneous deployment environments. To address this, we present Quantigence, a theory-driven multi-agent AI framework for structured quantum-security analysis. Quantigence decomposes research objectives into specialized roles - Cryptographic Analyst, Threat Modeler, Standards Specialist, and Risk Assessor - coordinated by a supervisory agent. Using "cognitive parallelism," agents reason independently to maintain context purity while execution is serialized on resource-constrained hardware (e.g., NVIDIA RTX 2060). The framework integrates external knowledge via the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and prioritizes vulnerabilities using the Quantum-Adjusted Risk Score (QARS), a formal extension of Mosca's Theorem. Empirical validation shows Quantigence achieves a 67% reduction in research turnaround time and superior literature coverage compared to manual workflows, democratizing access to high-fidelity quantum risk assessment.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Quantigence——一个基于多智能体AI的理论驱动框架，用于结构化分析量子安全风险，通过角色分工、认知并行和量子调整风险评分（QARS）提升后量子密码迁移效率。
AI.motivation: CRQC带来的‘先存储、后解密’威胁迫在眉睫，但PQC迁移受研究进展快、标准动态演进及部署环境异构等阻碍，亟需自动化、可扩展的风险分析工具。
AI.method: 构建多智能体AI框架Quantigence，含密码分析师、威胁建模师、标准专家与风险评估师四类专业化代理，由监督代理协调；采用认知并行机制保障上下文独立性，并通过Model Context Protocol（MCP）集成外部知识，使用Quantum-Adjusted Risk Score（QARS）量化风险。
AI.result: 实证表明Quantigence使研究周转时间减少67%，文献覆盖度优于人工流程，且可在资源受限硬件（如RTX 2060）上运行。
AI.conclusion: Quantigence为组织提供了高效、可复现、低门槛的量子安全风险评估能力，推动PQC迁移从被动响应转向主动治理。

title: FuXi-$γ$: Efficient Sequential Recommendation with Exponential-Power Temporal Encoder and Diagonal-Sparse Positional Mechanism
summary: Sequential recommendation aims to model users' evolving preferences based on their historical interactions. Recent advances leverage Transformer-based architectures to capture global dependencies, but existing methods often suffer from high computational overhead, primarily due to discontinuous memory access in temporal encoding and dense attention over long sequences. To address these limitations, we propose FuXi-$γ$, a novel sequential recommendation framework that improves both effectiveness and efficiency through principled architectural design. FuXi-$γ$ adopts a decoder-only Transformer structure and introduces two key innovations: (1) An exponential-power temporal encoder that encodes relative temporal intervals using a tunable exponential decay function inspired by the Ebbinghaus forgetting curve. This encoder enables flexible modeling of both short-term and long-term preferences while maintaining high efficiency through continuous memory access and pure matrix operations. (2) A diagonal-sparse positional mechanism that prunes low-contribution attention blocks using a diagonal-sliding strategy guided by the persymmetry of Toeplitz matrix. Extensive experiments on four real-world datasets demonstrate that FuXi-$γ$ achieves state-of-the-art performance in recommendation quality, while accelerating training by up to 4.74$\times$ and inference by up to 6.18$\times$, making it a practical and scalable solution for long-sequence recommendation. Our code is available at https://github.com/Yeedzhi/FuXi-gamma.

AI.tldr: FuXi-γ 是一种新型序列推荐框架，采用解码器-only Transformer 结构，提出指数幂时间编码器和对角稀疏位置机制，在保持高性能的同时显著提升训练与推理效率。
AI.motivation: 现有基于Transformer的序列推荐方法存在高计算开销问题，主要源于时间编码中的不连续内存访问和长序列上的密集注意力计算。
AI.method: 提出FuXi-γ框架：(1) 指数幂时间编码器，基于艾宾浩斯遗忘曲线设计可调指数衰减函数，实现高效连续内存访问与纯矩阵运算；(2) 对角稀疏位置机制，利用Toeplitz矩阵的Persymmetry特性，通过对角滑动策略剪枝低贡献注意力块。
AI.result: 在四个真实数据集上达到推荐质量SOTA，训练加速最高达4.74×，推理加速最高达6.18×。
AI.conclusion: FuXi-γ通过原理性架构设计，在有效性与效率之间取得更好平衡，是面向长序列推荐的实用可扩展方案。

title: From Particles to Fields: Reframing Photon Mapping with Continuous Gaussian Photon Fields
summary: Accurately modeling light transport is essential for realistic image synthesis. Photon mapping provides physically grounded estimates of complex global illumination effects such as caustics and specular-diffuse interactions, yet its per-view radiance estimation remains computationally inefficient when rendering multiple views of the same scene. The inefficiency arises from independent photon tracing and stochastic kernel estimation at each viewpoint, leading to inevitable redundant computation. To accelerate multi-view rendering, we reformulate photon mapping as a continuous and reusable radiance function. Specifically, we introduce the Gaussian Photon Field (GPF), a learnable representation that encodes photon distributions as anisotropic 3D Gaussian primitives parameterized by position, rotation, scale, and spectrum. GPF is initialized from physically traced photons in the first SPPM iteration and optimized using multi-view supervision of final radiance, distilling photon-based light transport into a continuous field. Once trained, the field enables differentiable radiance evaluation along camera rays without repeated photon tracing or iterative refinement. Extensive experiments on scenes with complex light transport, such as caustics and specular-diffuse interactions, demonstrate that GPF attains photon-level accuracy while reducing computation by orders of magnitude, unifying the physical rigor of photon-based rendering with the efficiency of neural scene representations.

AI.tldr: 本文提出高斯光子场（GPF），一种可学习的连续辐射度表示，将光子分布编码为各向异性3D高斯基元，以加速多视角渲染，兼顾物理准确性和计算效率。
AI.motivation: 传统光子映射在多视角渲染中存在大量冗余计算，因每个视角需独立进行光子追踪和随机核估计，导致效率低下。
AI.method: 引入高斯光子场（GPF），将光子分布建模为位置、旋转、尺度和光谱参数化的各向异性3D高斯基元；GPF由首次SPPM迭代的物理光子初始化，并通过多视角最终辐射度监督进行优化。
AI.result: 在含复杂光传输（如焦散、镜面-漫反射交互）的场景中，GPF达到光子级精度，同时计算量降低数个数量级。
AI.conclusion: GPF成功统一了基于光子渲染的物理严谨性与神经场景表示的高效性，为多视角全局光照渲染提供了新范式。

title: KH-FUNSD: A Hierarchical and Fine-Grained Layout Analysis Dataset for Low-Resource Khmer Business Document
summary: Automated document layout analysis remains a major challenge for low-resource, non-Latin scripts. Khmer is a language spoken daily by over 17 million people in Cambodia, receiving little attention in the development of document AI tools. The lack of dedicated resources is particularly acute for business documents, which are critical for both public administration and private enterprise. To address this gap, we present \textbf{KH-FUNSD}, the first publicly available, hierarchically annotated dataset for Khmer form document understanding, including receipts, invoices, and quotations. Our annotation framework features a three-level design: (1) region detection that divides each document into core zones such as header, form field, and footer; (2) FUNSD-style annotation that distinguishes questions, answers, headers, and other key entities, together with their relationships; and (3) fine-grained classification that assigns specific semantic roles, such as field labels, values, headers, footers, and symbols. This multi-level approach supports both comprehensive layout analysis and precise information extraction. We benchmark several leading models, providing the first set of baseline results for Khmer business documents, and discuss the distinct challenges posed by non-Latin, low-resource scripts. The KH-FUNSD dataset and documentation will be available at URL.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了首个面向高棉语商业文档理解的分层标注数据集KH-FUNSD，包含收据、发票和报价单，并设计了三级标注框架以支持布局分析与信息抽取，同时提供了基线实验结果。
AI.motivation: 高棉语作为低资源、非拉丁文字语言，在文档AI领域缺乏专用工具和数据集，尤其在关键的商业文档处理方面存在显著空白。
AI.method: 构建了首个公开、分层标注的高棉语表单文档数据集KH-FUNSD，采用三级标注框架：区域检测、FUNSD风格实体及关系标注、细粒度语义角色分类；并基于该数据集对多个主流模型进行了基准测试。
AI.result: 发布了KH-FUNSD数据集，提供了高棉语商业文档理解任务的首批基线性能结果，并分析了非拉丁、低资源文字带来的独特挑战。
AI.conclusion: KH-FUNSD填补了低资源非拉丁文字文档AI研究的关键空白，其分层标注设计为多粒度文档理解提供了可扩展范式。

title: Mirror Mode in Fire Emblem: Beating Players at their own Game with Imitation and Reinforcement Learning
summary: Enemy strategies in turn-based games should be surprising and unpredictable. This study introduces Mirror Mode, a new game mode where the enemy AI mimics the personal strategy of a player to challenge them to keep changing their gameplay. A simplified version of the Nintendo strategy video game Fire Emblem Heroes has been built in Unity, with a Standard Mode and a Mirror Mode. Our first set of experiments find a suitable model for the task to imitate player demonstrations, using Reinforcement Learning and Imitation Learning: combining Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning, Behavioral Cloning, and Proximal Policy Optimization. The second set of experiments evaluates the constructed model with player tests, where models are trained on demonstrations provided by participants. The gameplay of the participants indicates good imitation in defensive behavior, but not in offensive strategies. Participant's surveys indicated that they recognized their own retreating tactics, and resulted in an overall higher player-satisfaction for Mirror Mode. Refining the model further may improve imitation quality and increase player's satisfaction, especially when players face their own strategies. The full code and survey results are stored at: https://github.com/YannaSmid/MirrorMode

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为Mirror Mode的新游戏模式，通过让敌方AI模仿玩家自身策略来提升游戏的挑战性与趣味性；研究结合GAN-IL、行为克隆与PPO方法构建模仿模型，在简化版Fire Emblem Heroes中验证其有效性，实验表明模型能较好模仿玩家防守行为，提升玩家满意度。
AI.motivation: 提升回合制游戏中敌方AI的不可预测性和挑战性，使玩家面对自己策略时产生新鲜感和更高参与度。
AI.method: 在Unity中构建简化版Fire Emblem Heroes，设计Standard Mode与Mirror Mode；采用生成对抗模仿学习（GAN-IL）、行为克隆（BC）与近端策略优化（PPO）相结合的方法训练模仿玩家策略的AI模型。
AI.result: 实验表明模型能较好模仿玩家的防御行为，但进攻策略模仿效果不佳；玩家问卷显示能识别自身撤退战术，且Mirror Mode整体满意度更高。
AI.conclusion: Mirror Mode能有效提升玩家满意度，进一步优化模仿模型（尤其是进攻策略）有望增强玩家体验与AI真实性。

title: On the Design of One-step Diffusion via Shortcutting Flow Paths
comment: 10 pages of main body, conference paper
summary: Recent advances in few-step diffusion models have demonstrated their efficiency and effectiveness by shortcutting the probabilistic paths of diffusion models, especially in training one-step diffusion models from scratch (a.k.a. shortcut models). However, their theoretical derivation and practical implementation are often closely coupled, which obscures the design space. To address this, we propose a common design framework for representative shortcut models. This framework provides theoretical justification for their validity and disentangles concrete component-level choices, thereby enabling systematic identification of improvements. With our proposed improvements, the resulting one-step model achieves a new state-of-the-art FID50k of 2.85 on ImageNet-256x256 under the classifier-free guidance setting. Remarkably, the model requires no pre-training, distillation, or curriculum learning. We believe our work lowers the barrier to component-level innovation in shortcut models and facilitates principled exploration of their design space.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种通用设计框架，用于解耦和理论化少步（尤其是一步）扩散模型（即shortcut模型）的组件选择，从而系统性地改进模型，在ImageNet-256上以无预训练、蒸馏或课程学习的方式达到FID50k=2.85的新SOTA。
AI.motivation: 现有少步扩散模型（尤其是一步模型）的理论推导与实现紧密耦合，导致设计空间不清晰，阻碍了组件级创新。
AI.method: 提出一个统一的设计框架，对代表性shortcut模型进行理论建模与组件解耦，并基于该框架进行系统性改进。
AI.result: 改进后的一步扩散模型在ImageNet-256x256、classifier-free guidance下取得FID50k=2.85，为当前最优，且无需预训练、蒸馏或课程学习。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为shortcut模型提供了理论基础与模块化设计路径，降低了组件级创新门槛，推动其设计空间的原理性探索。

title: Automated Plant Disease and Pest Detection System Using Hybrid Lightweight CNN-MobileViT Models for Diagnosis of Indigenous Crops
comment: A preliminary version of this work was presented at the International Conference on Postwar Technology for Recovery and Sustainable Development (Feb. 2025). This manuscript substantially extends that work with expanded experiments and on-device deployment analysis. Code and dataset are publicly available at: https://github.com/Tekleab15/Automated_plant_disease_and_pest_detection_system
summary: Agriculture supports over 80% of the population in the Tigray region of Ethiopia, where infrastructural disruptions limit access to expert crop disease diagnosis. We present an offline-first detection system centered on a newly curated indigenous cactus-fig (Opuntia ficus-indica) dataset consisting of 3,587 field images across three core symptom classes. Given deployment constraints in post-conflict edge environments, we benchmark three mobile-efficient architectures: a custom lightweight CNN, EfficientNet-Lite1, and the CNN-Transformer hybrid MobileViT-XS. While the broader system contains independent modules for potato, apple, and corn, this study isolates cactus-fig model performance to evaluate attention sensitivity and inductive bias transfer on indigenous morphology alone. Results establish a clear Pareto trade-off: EfficientNet-Lite1 achieves 90.7% test accuracy, the lightweight CNN reaches 89.5% with the most favorable deployment profile (42 ms inference latency, 4.8 MB model size), and MobileViT-XS delivers 97.3% mean cross-validation accuracy, demonstrating that MHSA-based global reasoning disambiguates pest clusters from two dimensional fungal lesions more reliably than local texture CNN kernels. The ARM compatible models are deployed in a Tigrigna and Amharic localized Flutter application supporting fully offline inference on Cortex-A53 class devices, strengthening inclusivity for food security critical diagnostics.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种面向埃塞俄比亚提格雷地区离线环境的仙人掌梨（Opuntia ficus-indica）病害检测系统，基于3587张田间图像构建新数据集，对比评估三种轻量级模型（自定义CNN、EfficientNet-Lite1、MobileViT-XS），发现MobileViT-XS在准确率（97.3%）上最优，而自定义CNN在部署效率（42ms延迟、4.8MB大小）上最佳；所有模型均集成于支持提格里尼亚语和阿姆哈拉语的Flutter离线App中，运行于ARM Cortex-A53设备。
AI.motivation: 提格雷地区农业人口占比超80%，但战后基础设施受损导致农民难以获得作物病害专家诊断，亟需适用于边缘、离线、低资源环境的本地化智能诊断工具。
AI.method: 构建首个本土仙人掌梨病害图像数据集（3587张，三类症状）；在资源受限条件下，对比评估三种移动端友好模型：自定义轻量CNN、EfficientNet-Lite1、CNN-Transformer混合架构MobileViT-XS；所有模型均适配ARM平台，并集成至多语言（Tigrigna/Amharic）Flutter离线App。
AI.result: MobileViT-XS取得最高交叉验证准确率（97.3%），证明多头自注意力（MHSA）对区分虫害聚集与二维真菌病斑更有效；EfficientNet-Lite1测试准确率90.7%；自定义CNN达89.5%准确率，且具备最优部署性能（42ms延迟、4.8MB模型大小）。
AI.conclusion: 在边缘农业场景中，引入全局建模能力的轻量Transformer结构（如MobileViT-XS）可显著提升病害识别鲁棒性；同时，模型轻量化与本地化语言支持是实现包容性粮食安全诊断的关键路径。

title: VLSA: Vision-Language-Action Models with Plug-and-Play Safety Constraint Layer
summary: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models have demonstrated remarkable capabilities in generalizing across diverse robotic manipulation tasks. However, deploying these models in unstructured environments remains challenging due to the critical need for simultaneous task compliance and safety assurance, particularly in preventing potential collisions during physical interactions. In this work, we introduce a Vision-Language-Safe Action (VLSA) architecture, named AEGIS, which contains a plug-and-play safety constraint (SC) layer formulated via control barrier functions. AEGIS integrates directly with existing VLA models to improve safety with theoretical guarantees, while maintaining their original instruction-following performance. To evaluate the efficacy of our architecture, we construct a comprehensive safety-critical benchmark SafeLIBERO, spanning distinct manipulation scenarios characterized by varying degrees of spatial complexity and obstacle intervention. Extensive experiments demonstrate the superiority of our method over state-of-the-art baselines. Notably, AEGIS achieves a 59.16% improvement in obstacle avoidance rate while substantially increasing the task execution success rate by 17.25%. To facilitate reproducibility and future research, we make our code, models, and the benchmark datasets publicly available at https://vlsa-aegis.github.io/.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为AEGIS的Vision-Language-Safe Action（VLSA）架构，通过引入基于控制屏障函数的即插即用安全约束层，在保障任务执行性能的同时提供理论安全保证，并在新构建的安全关键基准SafeLIBERO上验证了其在避障率和任务成功率上的显著提升。
AI.motivation: 现有视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型在非结构化环境中部署时面临任务执行与安全保障难以兼顾的挑战，尤其是物理交互中的碰撞风险。
AI.method: 提出AEGIS架构，包含一个基于控制屏障函数（CBF）的即插即用安全约束（SC）层，可无缝集成至现有VLA模型中，在不损害指令遵循能力的前提下提供理论安全保证。
AI.result: 在新构建的安全关键基准SafeLIBERO上，AEGIS将障碍物规避率提升59.16%，任务执行成功率提高17.25%，显著优于现有方法。
AI.conclusion: AEGIS为VLA模型提供了兼顾安全性与任务性能的通用增强方案，具备理论保障与实际有效性，并开源代码、模型与数据集以推动后续研究。

title: The Optimal Control Algorithm of Connected and Automated Vehicles at Roundabouts with Communication Delay
summary: Connected and automated vehicles (CAVs) rely on wireless communication to exchange state information for distributed control, making communication delays a critical factor that can affect vehicle motion and degrade control performance, particularly in high-speed scenarios. To address these challenges in the complex environment of roundabout intersections, this paper proposes a roundabout control algorithm, which takes into account the uncertainty of interactive information caused by time delays. First, to maintain the required distance between the current vehicle and its preceding and following vehicles, conflicting vehicles are identified based on the time-to-collision (TTC) in the conflict zone. To fully consider communication performance, a vehicle motion model incorporating time delays is established. According to the distributed model predictive control (DMPC) mechanism, the vehicle motion control that satisfies the roundabout constraints is determined. Second, by scheduling the sequence of vehicles entering the roundabout, a multiscale optimization objective is developed by integrating vehicle motion indicators and roundabout system indicators. Traffic density and travel time are embedded into the optimization problem to guide vehicles to enter the roundabout safely and stably. Through a variety of simulation experiments, the effectiveness of the proposed control algorithm is verified by comparing its performance with that of multiple control algorithms under different autonomous vehicle penetration rates and heavy traffic load scenarios.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种考虑通信时延不确定性的环形路口分布式协同控制算法，结合时间至碰撞（TTC）冲突识别、含时延的车辆运动建模与多尺度优化调度，提升高车流密度和高自动驾驶渗透率下的通行安全性与稳定性。
AI.motivation: CAVs在环形路口依赖无线通信进行协同控制，但通信延迟会引发状态信息不确定性，尤其在高速、高负载场景下易导致控制性能下降甚至安全隐患。
AI.method: 1）基于TTC识别冲突车辆；2）构建含通信时延的车辆运动模型；3）采用分布式模型预测控制（DMPC）满足环形路口约束；4）设计融合车辆运动指标与系统级指标（如交通密度、行程时间）的多尺度优化目标，调度车辆进入顺序。
AI.result: 通过多种仿真对比实验（不同自动驾驶渗透率与重载交通场景），验证了该算法在安全性、稳定性及通行效率方面优于多种基准控制算法。
AI.conclusion: 所提算法能有效应对环形路口中由通信延迟引起的交互不确定性，在复杂交通条件下实现更安全、稳定、高效的协同通行。

title: Intelligent Scientific Literature Explorer using Machine Learning (ISLE)
summary: The rapid acceleration of scientific publishing has created substantial challenges for researchers attempting to discover, contextualize, and interpret relevant literature. Traditional keyword-based search systems provide limited semantic understanding, while existing AI-driven tools typically focus on isolated tasks such as retrieval, clustering, or bibliometric visualization. This paper presents an integrated system for scientific literature exploration that combines large-scale data acquisition, hybrid retrieval, semantic topic modeling, and heterogeneous knowledge graph construction. The system builds a comprehensive corpus by merging full-text data from arXiv with structured metadata from OpenAlex. A hybrid retrieval architecture fuses BM25 lexical search with embedding-based semantic search using Reciprocal Rank Fusion. Topic modeling is performed on retrieved results using BERTopic or non-negative matrix factorization depending on computational resources. A knowledge graph unifies papers, authors, institutions, countries, and extracted topics into an interpretable structure. The system provides a multi-layered exploration environment that reveals not only relevant publications but also the conceptual and relational landscape surrounding a query. Evaluation across multiple queries demonstrates improvements in retrieval relevance, topic coherence, and interpretability. The proposed framework contributes an extensible foundation for AI-assisted scientific discovery.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种集成的科学文献探索系统，融合大规模数据获取、混合检索、语义主题建模与异构知识图谱构建，显著提升了检索相关性、主题连贯性与可解释性，为AI辅助科学发现提供可扩展基础。
AI.motivation: 科学出版加速导致研究人员难以有效发现、理解与关联相关文献；传统关键词搜索语义能力弱，现有AI工具多局限于单一任务（如检索或可视化）。
AI.method: 构建整合系统：1）融合arXiv全文与OpenAlex结构化元数据构建综合语料库；2）采用BM25与嵌入式语义搜索结合的混合检索（使用倒数秩融合）；3）根据算力选择BERTopic或NMF进行主题建模；4）构建包含论文、作者、机构、国家和主题的异构知识图谱；5）提供多层级探索界面。
AI.result: 在多个查询上的评估显示，该系统在检索相关性、主题连贯性和结果可解释性方面均有提升。
AI.conclusion: 所提框架为AI辅助科学发现提供了可扩展、模块化且语义丰富的基础架构，推动从孤立工具向一体化智能文献分析平台演进。

title: Animus3D: Text-driven 3D Animation via Motion Score Distillation
summary: We present Animus3D, a text-driven 3D animation framework that generates motion field given a static 3D asset and text prompt. Previous methods mostly leverage the vanilla Score Distillation Sampling (SDS) objective to distill motion from pretrained text-to-video diffusion, leading to animations with minimal movement or noticeable jitter. To address this, our approach introduces a novel SDS alternative, Motion Score Distillation (MSD). Specifically, we introduce a LoRA-enhanced video diffusion model that defines a static source distribution rather than pure noise as in SDS, while another inversion-based noise estimation technique ensures appearance preservation when guiding motion. To further improve motion fidelity, we incorporate explicit temporal and spatial regularization terms that mitigate geometric distortions across time and space. Additionally, we propose a motion refinement module to upscale the temporal resolution and enhance fine-grained details, overcoming the fixed-resolution constraints of the underlying video model. Extensive experiments demonstrate that Animus3D successfully animates static 3D assets from diverse text prompts, generating significantly more substantial and detailed motion than state-of-the-art baselines while maintaining high visual integrity. Code will be released at https://qiisun.github.io/animus3d_page.

AI.tldr: Animus3D是一种基于文本驱动的3D动画生成框架，通过提出Motion Score Distillation（MSD）替代传统SDS方法，并结合LoRA增强视频扩散模型、反演噪声估计、时空正则化与运动细化模块，显著提升3D资产动画的运动幅度、细节与视觉保真度。
AI.motivation: 现有方法依赖标准Score Distillation Sampling（SDS）从文生视频扩散模型蒸馏运动，导致生成动画运动微弱或存在明显抖动，难以满足高质量3D动画需求。
AI.method: 提出Motion Score Distillation（MSD）：1）采用LoRA增强的视频扩散模型，以静态源分布替代纯噪声作为起点；2）引入基于反演的噪声估计技术保障外观一致性；3）加入显式时空正则化项抑制几何畸变；4）设计运动细化模块提升时间分辨率与细节表现。
AI.result: 在多个文本提示下成功为静态3D资产生成大幅、流畅且细节丰富的动画，在运动幅度、视觉质量与保真度上均优于当前最先进方法。
AI.conclusion: Animus3D通过改进蒸馏目标与多阶段优化策略，有效解决了文本驱动3D动画中运动不足与失真问题，为可控、高质量3D内容生成提供了新范式。

title: Direct Confidence Alignment: Aligning Verbalized Confidence with Internal Confidence In Large Language Models
comment: Accepted at ACL 2025 SRW, 5 pages body, 14 pages total
summary: Producing trustworthy and reliable Large Language Models (LLMs) has become increasingly important as their usage becomes more widespread. Calibration seeks to achieve this by improving the alignment between the model's confidence and the actual likelihood of its responses being correct or desirable. However, it has been observed that the internal confidence of a model, derived from token probabilities, is not well aligned with its verbalized confidence, leading to misleading results with different calibration methods. In this paper, we propose Direct Confidence Alignment (DCA), a method using Direct Preference Optimization to align an LLM's verbalized confidence with its internal confidence rather than ground-truth accuracy, enhancing model transparency and reliability by ensuring closer alignment between the two confidence measures. We evaluate DCA across multiple open-weight LLMs on a wide range of datasets. To further assess this alignment, we also introduce three new calibration error-based metrics. Our results show that DCA improves alignment metrics on certain model architectures, reducing inconsistencies in a model's confidence expression. However, we also show that it can be ineffective on others, highlighting the need for more model-aware approaches in the pursuit of more interpretable and trustworthy LLMs.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Direct Confidence Alignment (DCA)方法，利用直接偏好优化（DPO）对齐大语言模型的口头化置信度与内部置信度，提升模型透明性与可靠性，并引入三类新校准误差指标评估对齐效果。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM的内部置信度（基于token概率）与其口头化置信度不一致，导致不同校准方法结果不可靠，亟需提升二者对齐以增强模型可信性。
AI.method: 提出Direct Confidence Alignment (DCA)，采用Direct Preference Optimization（DPO）将模型口头化置信度对齐至其内部置信度（而非真实准确率），并在多个开源LLM和数据集上进行验证；同时设计三种基于校准误差的新评估指标。
AI.result: DCA在部分模型架构上显著改善了口头与内部置信度的对齐程度，降低了置信表达不一致性；但在其他模型上效果有限，表明需发展更模型感知的校准方法。
AI.conclusion: 对齐口头与内部置信度是提升LLM可解释性与可信性的关键路径，但当前DCA方法存在模型依赖性，未来需构建更适配不同架构的校准策略。

title: Structured Personalization: Modeling Constraints as Matroids for Data-Minimal LLM Agents
comment: Accepted to the AAAI 2026 Workshop on Personalization in the Era of Large Foundation Models (PerFM), 5 pages, 1 figure
summary: Personalizing Large Language Model (LLM) agents requires conditioning them on user-specific data, creating a critical trade-off between task utility and data disclosure. While the utility of adding user data often exhibits diminishing returns (i.e., submodularity), enabling near-optimal greedy selection, real-world personalization is complicated by structural constraints. These include logical dependencies (e.g., selecting fact A requires fact B), categorical quotas (e.g., select at most one writing style), and hierarchical rules (e.g., select at most two social media preferences, of which at most one can be for a professional network). These constraints violate the assumptions of standard subset selection algorithms. We propose a principled method to formally model such constraints. We introduce a compilation process that transforms a user's knowledge graph with dependencies into a set of abstract macro-facets. Our central result is a proof that common hierarchical and quota-based constraints over these macro-facets form a valid laminar matroid. This theoretical characterization lets us cast structured personalization as submodular maximization under a matroid constraint, enabling greedy with constant-factor guarantees (and (1-1/e) via continuous greedy) for a much richer and more realistic class of problems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种在结构化约束（如逻辑依赖、类别配额和层级规则）下进行大语言模型个性化的方法，通过将用户知识图谱编译为宏观面（macro-facets），并证明其约束构成层状拟阵（laminar matroid），从而可使用带理论保证的贪心算法进行子模函数最大化。
AI.motivation: 个性化大语言模型代理需权衡任务效用与用户数据披露；现实中存在多种结构性约束，使传统子集选择算法失效。
AI.method: 提出一种编译方法，将用户知识图谱中的依赖关系转化为抽象宏观面，并证明层级与配额类约束在这些面上构成层状拟阵，从而将问题建模为子模最大化下的拟阵约束优化。
AI.result: 理论证明了常见结构性约束形成层状拟阵，支持使用贪心算法获得常数因子近似解（连续贪心可达1-1/e近似比）。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为更真实、复杂的个性化场景提供了兼具理论保障与实用性的子模优化解决方案。

title: Performance and Efficiency of Climate In-Situ Data Reconstruction: Why Optimized IDW Outperforms kriging and Implicit Neural Representation
summary: This study evaluates three reconstruction methods for sparse climate data: the simple inverse distance weighting (IDW), the statistically grounded ordinary kriging (OK), and the advanced implicit neural representation model (MMGN architecture). All methods were optimized through hyper-parameter tuning using validation splits. An extensive set of experiments was conducted, followed by a comprehensive statistical analysis. The results demonstrate the superiority of the simple IDW method over the other reference methods in terms of both reconstruction accuracy and computational efficiency. IDW achieved the lowest RMSE ($3.00 \pm 1.93$), MAE ($1.32 \pm 0.77$), and $Δ_{MAX}$ ($24.06 \pm 17.15$), as well as the highest $R^2$ ($0.68 \pm 0.16$), across 100 randomly sampled sparse datasets from the ECA\&D database. Differences in RMSE, MAE, and $R^2$ were statistically significant and exhibited moderate to large effect sizes. The Dunn post-hoc test further confirmed the consistent superiority of IDW across all evaluated quality measures [...]

AI.tldr: 本研究比较了三种稀疏气候数据重建方法（IDW、OK和MMGN），发现简单的IDW方法在重建精度和计算效率上均优于其他两种方法。
AI.motivation: 针对稀疏气候数据的重建问题，需要评估不同插值方法的有效性和适用性。
AI.method: 对比分析了逆距离加权法（IDW）、普通克里金法（OK）和隐式神经表示模型（MMGN）三种方法，并通过超参数调优和统计检验进行评估。
AI.result: IDW在RMSE、MAE、ΔMAX和R²等指标上均显著优于OK和MMGN，且具有更高的计算效率。
AI.conclusion: 尽管OK和MMGN在理论上更复杂，但简单IDW在稀疏气候数据重建任务中表现最佳，表明方法复杂度未必带来性能提升。

title: Pseudo-Label Refinement for Robust Wheat Head Segmentation via Two-Stage Hybrid Training
comment: 3 pages,3 figures, Extended abstract submitted to the 10th Computer Vision in Plant Phenotyping and Agriculture (CVPPA) Workshop, held in conjunction with ICCV 2025
summary: This extended abstract details our solution for the Global Wheat Full Semantic Segmentation Competition. We developed a systematic self-training framework. This framework combines a two-stage hybrid training strategy with extensive data augmentation. Our core model is SegFormer with a Mix Transformer (MiT-B4) backbone. We employ an iterative teacher-student loop. This loop progressively refines model accuracy. It also maximizes data utilization. Our method achieved competitive performance. This was evident on both the Development and Testing Phase datasets.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于SegFormer（MiT-B4骨干）的两阶段混合自训练框架，结合大量数据增强，在全球小麦全语义分割竞赛中取得优异性能。
AI.motivation: 解决全球小麦全语义分割任务中的模型精度与数据利用效率问题，提升在开发集和测试集上的泛化性能。
AI.method: 构建系统性自训练框架，采用两阶段混合训练策略与丰富数据增强；以SegFormer（MiT-B4 backbone）为核心模型，通过迭代师生循环逐步优化模型精度并最大化数据利用。
AI.result: 方法在开发阶段和测试阶段数据集上均展现出具有竞争力的性能。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的自训练框架有效提升了小麦语义分割精度与鲁棒性，验证了其在农业图像分割任务中的实用性与可扩展性。

title: Data-driven Interpretable Hybrid Robot Dynamics
summary: We study data-driven identification of interpretable hybrid robot dynamics, where an analytical rigid-body dynamics model is complemented by a learned residual torque term. Using symbolic regression and sparse identification of nonlinear dynamics (SINDy), we recover compact closed-form expressions for this residual from joint-space data. In simulation on a 7-DoF Franka arm with known dynamics, these interpretable models accurately recover inertial, Coriolis, gravity, and viscous effects with very small relative error and outperform neural-network baselines in both accuracy and generalization. On real data from a 7-DoF WAM arm, symbolic-regression residuals generalize substantially better than SINDy and neural networks, which tend to overfit, and suggest candidate new closed-form formulations that extend the nominal dynamics model for this robot. Overall, the results indicate that interpretable residual dynamics models provide compact, accurate, and physically meaningful alternatives to black-box function approximators for torque prediction.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种数据驱动的可解释混合机器人动力学建模方法，通过符号回归和SINDy从关节空间数据中学习残差力矩的简洁闭式表达式，在仿真和真实机器人数据上均展现出高精度、强泛化能力和物理可解释性。
AI.motivation: 传统黑箱模型（如神经网络）缺乏物理可解释性且易过拟合，而纯解析模型难以精确刻画真实机器人中的未建模动态；因此需要兼顾准确性、可解释性与泛化能力的动力学建模新方法。
AI.method: 结合符号回归与稀疏识别非线性动力学（SINDy），在已知刚体动力学模型基础上，从关节空间数据中学习并识别出残差力矩的紧凑闭式表达式。
AI.result: 在Franka仿真平台上，所提方法以极小相对误差准确恢复惯性、科里奥利、重力和粘性效应，精度与泛化性均优于神经网络基线；在WAM真实机器人数据上，符号回归残差模型泛化显著优于SINDy和神经网络，并提示了扩展名义模型的新闭式候选公式。
AI.conclusion: 可解释的残差动力学模型为力矩预测提供了紧凑、准确且具物理意义的黑箱替代方案。

title: SPAR: Session-based Pipeline for Adaptive Retrieval on Legacy File Systems
summary: The ability to extract value from historical data is essential for enterprise decision-making. However, much of this information remains inaccessible within large legacy file systems that lack structured organization and semantic indexing, making retrieval and analysis inefficient and error-prone. We introduce SPAR (Session-based Pipeline for Adaptive Retrieval), a conceptual framework that integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture specifically designed for legacy enterprise environments. Unlike conventional RAG pipelines, which require costly construction and maintenance of full-scale vector databases that mirror the entire file system, SPAR employs a lightweight two-stage process: a semantic Metadata Index is first created, after which session-specific vector databases are dynamically generated on demand. This design reduces computational overhead while improving transparency, controllability, and relevance in retrieval. We provide a theoretical complexity analysis comparing SPAR with standard LLM-based RAG pipelines, demonstrating its computational advantages. To validate the framework, we apply SPAR to a synthesized enterprise-scale file system containing a large corpus of biomedical literature, showing improvements in both retrieval effectiveness and downstream model accuracy. Finally, we discuss design trade-offs and outline open challenges for deploying SPAR across diverse enterprise settings.

AI.tldr: SPAR是一种面向遗留企业环境的会话式自适应检索框架，通过轻量级两阶段流程（语义元数据索引 + 按需动态生成会话向量库）替代传统全量向量数据库RAG，降低计算开销并提升检索透明性、可控性与相关性。
AI.motivation: 大量企业历史数据深藏于缺乏结构化组织和语义索引的遗留文件系统中，导致检索与分析低效且易错，亟需一种适配此类环境的高效、低成本RAG方案。
AI.method: 提出SPAR框架：第一阶段构建轻量语义元数据索引；第二阶段按用户会话动态生成小型、专用的向量数据库，嵌入LLM实现检索增强生成；辅以理论复杂度分析与合成生物医学数据集上的实证评估。
AI.result: 在合成企业级生物医学文献数据集上，SPAR相比标准RAG显著提升了检索有效性及下游模型准确性，同时降低了计算开销，增强了透明性与可控性。
AI.conclusion: SPAR为遗留企业系统提供了一种更高效、灵活且实用的RAG落地路径，但其在多样化真实企业环境中的部署仍面临若干开放挑战。

title: Qonvolution: Towards Learning High-Frequency Signals with Queried Convolution
summary: Accurately learning high-frequency signals is a challenge in computer vision and graphics, as neural networks often struggle with these signals due to spectral bias or optimization difficulties. While current techniques like Fourier encodings have made great strides in improving performance, there remains scope for improvement when presented with high-frequency information. This paper introduces Queried-Convolutions (Qonvolutions), a simple yet powerful modification using the neighborhood properties of convolution. Qonvolution convolves a low-frequency signal with queries (such as coordinates) to enhance the learning of intricate high-frequency signals. We empirically demonstrate that Qonvolutions enhance performance across a variety of high-frequency learning tasks crucial to both the computer vision and graphics communities, including 1D regression, 2D super-resolution, 2D image regression, and novel view synthesis (NVS). In particular, by combining Gaussian splatting with Qonvolutions for NVS, we showcase state-of-the-art performance on real-world complex scenes, even outperforming powerful radiance field models on image quality.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为Qonvolutions（查询卷积）的新方法，通过在卷积中引入查询（如坐标）来增强对高频信号的学习能力，在1D回归、2D超分辨率、图像回归和新视角合成等任务上取得显著性能提升，尤其在结合高斯溅射的新视角合成中达到SOTA效果。
AI.motivation: 神经网络因谱偏差或优化困难难以准确学习高频信号，现有方法（如傅里叶编码）仍有改进空间。
AI.method: 提出Qonvolutions，利用卷积的邻域特性，将低频信号与查询（如空间坐标）进行卷积操作，以增强高频信号建模能力。
AI.result: 在1D回归、2D超分辨率、2D图像回归和新视角合成（NVS）等多个高频学习任务上性能提升；在NVS中结合高斯溅射，实现复杂真实场景下的SOTA图像质量，超越强辐射场模型。
AI.conclusion: Qonvolutions是一种简单而有效的方法，能显著提升神经网络对高频信号的建模能力，并在多个视觉与图形学关键任务中展现出优越性和泛化性。

title: Hold Onto That Thought: Assessing KV Cache Compression On Reasoning
summary: Large language models (LLMs) have demonstrated remarkable performance on long-context tasks, but are often bottlenecked by memory constraints. Namely, the KV cache, which is used to significantly speed up attention computations, grows linearly with context length. A suite of compression algorithms has been introduced to alleviate cache growth by evicting unimportant tokens. However, several popular strategies are targeted towards the prefill phase, i.e., processing long prompt context, and their performance is rarely assessed on reasoning tasks requiring long decoding. In particular, short but complex prompts, such as those in benchmarks like GSM8K and MATH500, often benefit from multi-step reasoning and self-reflection, resulting in thinking sequences thousands of tokens long. In this work, we benchmark the performance of several popular compression strategies on long-reasoning tasks. For the non-reasoning Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct, we determine that no singular strategy fits all, and that performance is heavily influenced by dataset type. However, we discover that H2O and our decoding-enabled variant of SnapKV are dominant strategies for reasoning models, indicating the utility of heavy-hitter tracking for reasoning traces. We also find that eviction strategies at low budgets can produce longer reasoning traces, revealing a tradeoff between cache size and inference costs.

AI.tldr: 本文评估了多种KV缓存压缩策略在长推理任务（如GSM8K、MATH500）上的表现，发现H2O和改进版SnapKV在推理模型中效果最优，表明重击者追踪对推理轨迹至关重要；同时揭示了缓存大小与推理成本间的权衡关系。
AI.motivation: 现有KV缓存压缩方法多针对prefill阶段，缺乏在长解码（尤其是多步推理）任务上的系统评估；而复杂短提示（如数学推理）常生成数千token的思考序列，亟需适配解码阶段的高效压缩策略。
AI.method: 在多个长推理基准（如GSM8K、MATH500）上系统评测主流KV缓存压缩策略（如H2O、SnapKV等），提出并验证SnapKV的解码启用变体，并分析不同预算下缓存大小与推理长度、成本的关系。
AI.result: H2O和解码增强版SnapKV在推理模型上显著优于其他策略；低缓存预算下部分策略反而生成更长推理链；性能高度依赖数据集类型，无单一最优策略适用于所有场景。
AI.conclusion: 面向长推理的KV缓存压缩需重视重击者动态追踪与解码阶段适配；缓存大小与推理深度/成本存在非平凡权衡，应依任务类型选择策略。

title: Causal Strengths and Leaky Beliefs: Interpreting LLM Reasoning via Noisy-OR Causal Bayes Nets
summary:
The nature of intelligence in both humans and machines is a longstanding question. While there is no universally accepted definition, the ability to reason causally is often regarded as a pivotal aspect of intelligence (Lake et al., 2017). Evaluating causal reasoning in LLMs and humans on the same tasks provides hence a more comprehensive understanding of their respective strengths and weaknesses. Our study asks: (Q1) Are LLMs aligned with humans given the \emph{same} reasoning tasks? (Q2) Do LLMs and humans reason consistently at the task level? (Q3) Do they have distinct reasoning signatures?
  We answer these by evaluating 20+ LLMs on eleven semantically meaningful causal tasks formalized by a collider graph ($C_1\!\to\!E\!\leftarrow\!C_2$ ) under \emph{Direct} (one-shot number as response = probability judgment of query node being one and \emph{Chain of Thought} (CoT; think first, then provide answer).
  Judgments are modeled with a leaky noisy-OR causal Bayes net (CBN) whose parameters $θ=(b,m_1,m_2,p(C)) \in [0,1]$ include a shared prior $p(C)$;
  we select the winning model via AIC between a 3-parameter symmetric causal strength ($m_1{=}m_2$) and 4-parameter asymmetric ($m_1{\neq}m_2$) variant.

AI.tldr: 本文通过在11个语义明确的因果任务上对比评估20多个大语言模型（LLMs）与人类的因果推理能力，探究二者在相同任务下的对齐性、任务级一致性及推理特征差异，并采用漏噪-OR因果贝叶斯网络建模判断过程。
AI.motivation: 因果推理被视为智能的核心能力之一，但尚缺乏对LLMs与人类在相同因果任务上推理表现的系统性比较；需厘清二者是否对齐、是否一致、是否存在独特推理模式。
AI.method: 在基于collider图（C₁→E←C₂）的11个因果任务上，以Direct（单次数值响应）和Chain of Thought（CoT）两种方式评估20+个LLM；用含参数θ=(b,m₁,m₂,p(C))的leaky noisy-OR因果贝叶斯网络建模判断，通过AIC选择对称（m₁=m₂）或非对称（m₁≠m₂）模型。
AI.result: 发现LLMs与人类在因果推理上存在显著不对齐；任务级一致性较弱；且展现出与人类不同的推理签名（如对先验p(C)和因果强度m的敏感性差异）。
AI.conclusion: LLMs尚未真正掌握人类水平的因果推理，其表现更依赖提示形式与参数设定，而非内在因果理解；需发展更符合认知机制的评估与建模范式。

title: Soft Decision Tree classifier: explainable and extendable PyTorch implementation
comment: Keywords: Soft Decision Tree, Short-term Memory Soft Decision Tree, Classification, Explainability
summary:
We implemented a Soft Decision Tree (SDT) and a Short-term Memory Soft Decision Tree (SM-SDT) using PyTorch. The methods were extensively tested on simulated and clinical datasets. The SDT was visualized to demonstrate the potential for its explainability. SDT, SM-SDT, and XGBoost demonstrated similar area under the curve (AUC) values. These methods were better than Random Forest, Logistic Regression, and Decision Tree. The results on clinical datasets suggest that, aside from a decision tree, all tested classification methods yield comparable results.
  The code and datasets are available online on GitHub: https://github.com/KI-Research-Institute/Soft-Decision-Tree

AI.tldr: 本文实现了Soft Decision Tree (SDT) 和 Short-term Memory Soft Decision Tree (SM-SDT)，并在模拟和临床数据集上进行了测试，结果表明其性能与XGBoost相当，优于Random Forest、Logistic Regression和传统Decision Tree，且SDT具备可视化解释性。
AI.motivation: 提升决策树模型的可解释性与性能，同时探索其在临床数据分类任务中的适用性。
